articles.title: Protests against Elon Musk’s role in Trump administration swarm Tesla showrooms - PBS NewsHour
articles.description: Protesters against billionaire Elon Musk’s purge of the U.S. government under President Donald Trump demonstrated outside Tesla dealerships throughout the U.S. and in some cities in Europe on Saturday in the latest attempt to dent the fortune of the world’s r…
articles.content: SAN FRANCISCO (AP) Protesters against billionaire Elon Musks purge of the U.S. government under President Donald Trump demonstrated outside Tesla dealerships throughout the U.S. and in some cities in… [+6579 chars]
